availability.p: All research and writing of Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition annotations was undertaken by project staff, volunteers, and interns. Each record contains citations to relevant primary and secondary source material. All annotations are copyright Kentucky Historical Society, and should be referenced as such in any published work.

seriesStmt.title: Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition

person.persName: James S. Whitton (Scott County, Kentucky, farmer. )

body.p: Scott County, Kentucky, farmer. Kentucky native. Son of P. H. Whitton and Annie Whitton. Married to Virginia Whitton. Father of Matilda Whitton and Carry Whitton. Farmer in Scott County in 1860.

ab.bibl:
Eighth Manuscript Census of the United States (1860), Population Schedules, Kentucky, Scott County, District No 1, p. 960.
Ninth Manuscript Census of the United States (1870), Population Schedules, Kentucky, Scott County, Stamping Ground, p. 328A.
Find A Grave, "James S. Whitton (Mary 15, 1838- May 10, 1917)," Memorial #59410424, http://www.findagrave.com/memorial/59410424 (accessed February 13, 2019).
